Name: MRI data of 3-12 year old children and adults during viewing of a short animated film
Acknowledgements: We thank the Athinoula A. Martinos Imaging Center at the McGovern Institute for Brain Research at MIT, Jorie Koster-Hale, Natalia Velez-Alicea, Mika Asaba, and Nir Jacoby for help with data collection. We thank Todd Thompson for his work making this dataset publicly available.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the following paper when acknowledging use of this dataset: [Paper currently revised and resubmitted] and include the following message 'This data was obtained from the OpenfMRI database. Its accession number is ds000228.'
Funding: This project was supported by a NSF Graduate Research Fellowship (#1122374 to HR), and an NSF CAREER award (#095518 to RS), NIH R01-MH096914-05, a Middleton Chair grant (RS), and support from the David and Lucile Packard Foundation (to RS)
